Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 8 Nīvaraṇagocchaka » 8.5 Nīvaraṇanīvaraṇasampayuttaduka » 8.5.1 Paṭiccavāra
8.5.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nīvaraṇagocchaka
Nīvaraṇanīvaraṇasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
99.
2105Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), magge tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
